sentence.Network_en: European bittercress having a knotted white rootstock.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种欧洲碎米荠,具有带节的白色根干.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various herbs of the genus Cardamine, having usually pinnate leaves and racemes of white, pink or purple flowers; cosmopolitan except Antarctic
